title: Lease-purchase agreement defined
context: [ยง481M-2] Lease-purchase agreement defined. A lease-purchase agreement is an agreement for the use of personal property by a natural person primarily for personal, family, or household purposes, for an initial period of four months or less that: (1) Is automatically renewable with each payment after the initial period; (2) Does not obligate or require the lessee to continue leasing or using the property beyond the initial period; and (3) Permits the lessee to become the owner of the property.
